      • login

        public UserDTO login(java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws BusinessException
        Takes the username and password of a user and if they are correct, it returns the corresponding DTO. Otherwise it will throw an exception. If there were more than 5 failed login attempts for the user, it will deactivate the user.
        Parameters:
        email -
        password -
        Returns:
        a user DTO if it succeeds.
        Throws:
        BusinessException

      • updateUser

        public UserDTO updateUser(UserDTO userDTO)
                   throws BusinessException
        Updates the user with the contents of the given DTO. If the name of the user has changed it will also change the username. Also creates the notification message and type to be sent to both users.
        Parameters:
        userDTO -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        BusinessException
